dict.acceptation: 损坏，糟蹋；把（酒，肉等）放坏；溺爱坏，宠坏（孩子等）；抢劫，掠夺；
抢劫，掠夺；废品，次品；成功所带来的好处；（开掘等时挖出的）弃土；

sent.orig: And Chaldea shall be a spoil: all that spoil her shall be satisfied, saith the LORD.
sent.trans: 迦勒底必成为掠物。凡掳掠她的都必心满意足。这是耶和华说的。

sent.orig: The invaders made spoil of all in their way.
sent.trans: 侵略者所到之处无不洗劫一空。

sent.orig: Don't spoil your appetite by eating sweets before meals.
sent.trans: 饭前不要吃糖以免影响食欲。

sent.orig: The music was bad, but not nearly enough to spoil a movie.
sent.trans: 音乐很糟糕，但还远不足以毁掉一部电影。

sent.orig: Put the hot dish down on the mat, so you do not spoil the table.
sent.trans: 把热菜盘放在小垫子上，这样就不会烫坏桌面了。
